svg.text: politics
The political crime evident in the inanity of [FDAC] is
found in the absurdity of the self contradiction of
evidence and accusation. The relatively well known
pattern of terror by the absurdity of peridolia
demonstrated, represented, and championed by Donald Trump.
The common and universal pattern of aggression and
violence intended to frustrate the defenses by the
adoptions and adaptations of sociopathology demonstrated
by the government is at least a violation of 18
U.S.C. ยง242 "Deprivation of rights under color of law".
The crime deprives the defendant of the human rights of
peace and dignity. Additionally, the crime is political.
An example of the pernicious political activity
circumscribed by the Hatch Act.
References

[DOJR] https://www.justice.gov/crt/deprivation-rights-under-color-law
[WIKH] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hatch_Act
